archimate:Requirement.name: PA.1.5.5: Technical vulnerabilities in specialised computing equipment and devices should be identified (e.g. by using digital twinning where a virtual copy of a specialised device is used for testing).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
